content: this strawberry blossom granny pentagon is so cute and very textured in dk yarn it will make the perfect top to a granny square bucket hat it would also be a great start to a halterneck top or could be a perfect block on its own for a purse these pentagon granny s in dk yarn are approximately 6 inches from the tallest points and 4 ½ inches on each of the sides but will vary in size depending on materials used in worsted weight they are approximately 7 inches from the tallest points and 5 ½ inches along each of the sides pattern comes as a written/photo tutorial and includes a video link where you can crochet along with me cover photo credit to my tester loomedbylacy /people/loomedbylacy
